channel.title: TopWritings A place to Write!
channel.description:
Top Writings is an Awesome site where you can post your stories, Poems, skits, etc. We've created this site from complete scratch, and is almost bugless, The website still may have bugs which is still in Beta. But still accessible. The website has similar functions to what a forum has: You can post any sort of writing, and use HTML tags such as

You can give a vote to the writing you are viewing (Just like giving reps on Forums) You can highlight any words in a story and then click on "Click here to find out what the word means" and it'll automatically find you the word definition You can send Private Messages You can comment on a writing that you are viewing And much more for you to discover! Heres the website :) http://topwritings.com/

Usually because they don’t want all their members joining another FORUM instead of theirs, meaning loss of population+ more inactivity

item.title: TopWritings A place to Write!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“Zirakac, post:8, topic:229711”][quote author=io9 link=topic=302263.msg2425427#msg2425427 date=1220571041]
IT STILL ADVERTISING U FAGGOT.
AGAINST DA RULES YOU FAGGOT.
[/quote]

You know why its in the rules, Usually because they don’t want all their members joining another FORUM instead of theirs, meaning loss of population+ more inactivity

This site, hardly does any of that.[/quote]
It’s not in the rules for that reason, due to the fact that any person who advertises a forum here fails epicly.

@Zirakac wrote:

Top Writings is an Awesome site where you can post your stories, Poems, skits, etc.

We’ve created this site from complete scratch, and is almost bugless, The website still may have bugs which is still in Beta. But still accessible.

The website has similar functions to what a forum has:
You can post any sort of writing, and use HTML tags such as


You can give a vote to the writing you are viewing (Just like giving reps on Forums)

You can highlight any words in a story and then click on “Click here to find out what the word means” and it’ll automatically find you the word definition

You can send Private Messages

You can comment on a writing that you are viewing

And much more for you to discover!
